name: Mini Loop
description:
Originally made for the Quad Jam #3

Mini Loop is a simple to play idle game where your only objective is to make big number grow.

The Time Loop

Each Time this world loops a small energy is created, and with this energy you can create a bunch of different things, including conquer other peoples worlds!

Mini worlds

With the loops you get in your own world, you can start looping other people's worlds. Each world giving a different amount of time loops depending on how long it takes to complete a loop. But you can make the time to complete a loop in this mini world shorter by spending more and more of your loops into this mini world.
